snippet: Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron of France repeated as ice dance world champions despite missing the Grand Prix season because of injury.
abstract: France's Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron win their second straight ice dance world championship at TD Garden in Boston; other skating news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron of France repeated as ice dance world champions despite missing the Grand Prix season because of injury.
